question.title: How to represent the properties in Spring application.properties as a Map<String,List<String>>
question.body:
I want to read some properties from Spring Boot application.properties.

The properties are in this format

vnfc.audit.ignore.list.tas=ims_rmt_server,contact
vnfc.audit.ignore.list.ims=product,kafka
vnfc.audit.ignore.list.uag=realm,Cassandra

I need to read these properties as a Map. The map should contain the keys as tas,ims,uag, its value should be list of the corresponding values.

[
  tas -> [ims_rmt_server,contact]
  ims-> [product,kafka]
  uag-> [realm,Cassandra]
]

I tried the below configuration but I get an exception

@Configuration
@ConfigurationProperties(prefix = "vnfc.audit.ignore.list")
public class MyAppProperties {
    private Map<String, List<String>> map = new HashMap<>();

    public Map<String, List<String>> getMap() {
        return map;
    }

    public void setMap(Map<String, List<String>> tas) {
    this.map = tas;
    }
}

***************************
APPLICATION FAILED TO START
***************************

Description:

Failed to bind properties under 'vnfc.audit.ignore.list.tas' to java.util.Map<java.lang.String, java.util.List<java.lang.String>>:

Property: vnfc.audit.ignore.list.tas
Value: "ims_rmt_server,contact"
Origin: class path resource [application.properties] - 1:28
Reason: org.springframework.core.convert.ConverterNotFoundException: No converter found capable of converting from type [java.lang.String] to type [java.util.Map<java.lang.String, java.util.List<java.lang.String>>]

Action:

Update your application's configuration


Process finished with exit code 1

How can I resolve this?
